productsCategories.categoryDescription: New to World of Warcraft? Start here.

products.productName: World of Warcraft®: Welcome to Azeroth Bundle
products.yellowText: Everything you need to begin your adventure, offer available through June 23!

productData.productName: World of Warcraft®: Welcome to Azeroth Bundle
productData.yellowText: Everything you need to begin your adventure, offer available through June 23!
descriptions: Take one small step into an adventure of a lifetime. With this limited-time value-packed offer, you get everything you need to begin your World of Warcraft journey today! Take to the skies in the critically acclaimed Dragonflight expansion, and prepare for a grand new adventure beginning August 26 at 3PM PDT with The War Within*.

Your Welcome to Azeroth bundle will include a Level 60 Character Boost and 60 Days of Game Time, so you can jump right into the Dragonflight content and discover the magic of Azeroth at your own pace.

productInfo.text: If you already have Dragonflight on your account, the expansion will not be re-granted.
Level 60 Character Boost not useable on World of Warcraft® Classic characters

data.heading: An Epic Adventure At Your Own Pace
data.description: Create a hero of the noble Alliance or the mighty Horde. New or returning defenders of Azeroth can explore Exile's Reach to unearth the fate of a lost expedition while mastering new skills, or immediately boost a character to level 60 to join the battle against ancient proto-dragons in Dragonflight.

data.heading: World of Warcraft®: Dragonflight
data.description: Spread your wings and dash into the latest World of Warcraft content with the included Dragonflight expansion and 60 Days Game Time. Discover daring quests and rise to new heights of power as you level up your character while exploring the magic and wonder of the Dragon Isles.

data.heading: The Next Grand Adventure
data.description: Explore Dragonflight and prepare for an epic three-expansion story arc beginning with The War Within*, launching August 26 at 3PM PDT. Learn more about the upcoming expansion and how to prepare for the next chapter of World of Warcraft.

productRequirements: Requires World of Warcraft®, Internet connection, Battle.net® Account, and Battle.net® desktop app to play.
Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time

products.yellowText: Play free up to level 20!

productData.descriptionHeading: Begin Your Adventure & Play Free Up to Level 20!
descriptions: Introducing a whole new way to begin your next great adventure. With this World of Warcraft® free trial*, you'll create your hero, join the Horde or Alliance, and venture to the mysterious island of Exile’s Reach in search of a lost expedition. Prepare to embark, adventurer. Your first quest awaits.

productInfo.text: *Free Trial is not available in World of Warcraft® Classic.

data.heading: Be the hero you want to be
data.description: First, pick a side - the noble Alliance fighting for justice and duty or the mighty Horde standing for honor and freedom. Then choose your race and class to create a hero that's right for you. Will you fight as a hulking tauren warrior or perhaps an inventive gnome warlock? The choice is yours!

data.heading: Embark on a heroic journey
data.description: Learn the ropes through an epic starting adventure at Exile's Reach—discover the fate of a lost expedition as you pick up new skills and face two new bosses in a “mini-dungeon” designed from 1 to 5 players.

data.heading: Adventure to level 20
data.description: As you leave Exile's Reach behind, the lessons you've mastered will help you as you embark on the Battle for Azeroth content. Advance your hero to level 20, then continue playing as much as you want! When you're ready to progress further, simply subscribe to access an ever-growing universe and continue leveling to 60. Welcome to World of Warcraft!

productRequirements: *Free Trial is not available in World of Warcraft® Classic.
Limitations apply
Any applicable VAT included

products.productName: World of Warcraft®: The War Within™
products.yellowText: The War Within launches August 26, at 3PM PT! Upgrade to the Epic Edition and get Beta Access Now.

productData.productName: World of Warcraft®: The War Within™
productData.yellowText: The War Within launches August 26, at 3PM PT! Upgrade to the Epic Edition and get Beta Access Now.
descriptions: Upgrade to the Epic Edition to get early access starting August 22, at 3PM PT, along with guaranteed access to the Beta, available now!

In this opening chapter of The Worldsoul Saga™, you'll journey through never-before-seen subterranean worlds filled with hidden wonders and lurking perils, down to the dark depths of the Nerubian empire, where the inscrutable Harbinger of the Void has gathered her arachnid forces to bring Azeroth to its knees.
Deliver justice upon the servants of the Shadow, investigate the dark motives behind the Harbinger's machinations, and take part in a thrilling new adventure spanning WoW’s next three expansions¹.

Pre-purchase² World of Warcraft: The War Within and unlock a slew of benefits to aid you in your coming adventures! All editions include an Enhanced Level 70 Character Boost and the critically-acclaimed Dragonflight expansion³. In addition, the Epic Edition also guarantees Beta Access and Early Access⁴ (August 22, 3PM PT) to The War Within. All in-game items are available immediately unless otherwise noted.
The upcoming expansion launches globally at the same time around the world. Here's what that means based on your local time zone:

productInfo.text: ¹Future expansions not included in WoW®: The War Within™ purchase.
Requires World of Warcraft®, Internet connection, Battle.net® Account, and Battle.net® desktop app to play.
Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time
²World of Warcraft®: The War Within™ launches on August 26 at 3PM PT.
³If you already have Dragonflight on your account, the expansion will not be re-granted.

⁴Beta Access and Early Access dates subject to change. Minimum Early Access duration is 3 days. Limited time only. Play time subject to possible outages and time zone differences. Certain endgame features, including Mythic dungeons and weekly quests, not available during Early Access.
In-game items not available in WoW® Classic games. Boost only usable on the WoW® game account on which it was purchased or redeemed.

Upgrading to the Heroic or Epic Edition will not re-grant in-game items previously unlocked on your account. Trader's Tender is granted only once per Battle.net® account and region upon first purchase of each edition, at a maximum of 1000 Tender from Epic.

content.name: World of Warcraft: The War Within available at launch²
Algarian Stormrider mount with Skyriding, dozens of customization options, and access to special racecourses
Beta Access to The War Within⁴
3 Days Early Access to The War Within⁴

productFeatures.heading: World of Warcraft: The War Within

data.heading: The Worldsoul Saga begins
data.description: The wings of a grand new adventure spread widely across the next three expansions¹! Be a part of the epic story that celebrates the first 20 years of World of Warcraft and sets new foundations for Azeroth's future.

data.heading: Explore the vast depths of Azeroth
data.description: Journey deep beneath the surface through the four expansive zones of Khaz Algar, the home of the titan-forged Earthen. Start your adventure on the Isle of Dorn off the western shores of Kalimdor and descend into The Ringing Deeps. Then marvel at the brilliant sights of Hallowfall before plunging into Azj-Kahet, the high capital of nerubian society.

data.heading: Enjoy a trove of fresh features
data.description: Earn the trust of the Earthen and unlock an all-new playable Allied Race. Explore Delves, new bite-sized world instances you can tackle alone or with up to four friends, plus an NPC companion. Grow in strength as you level to 80 and earn new skills with Hero Talent trees, share progress across your family of characters with the Warbands system, and take to the skies with Skyriding, now available for hundreds of existing mounts!

data.heading: Base Edition
data.description: Includes the World of Warcraft: The War Within pre-purchase, World of Warcraft: Dragonflight³, an Enhanced Level 70 Character Boost with upgraded gear, reputation progress, and more, to prepare you for your adventures in the depths of the world. Also includes 500 Trader's Tender to use in the Trading Post.

data.heading: Heroic Edition
data.description: Includes everything in the Base Edition. Plus, you'll receive the Algarian Stormrider mount with Skyriding and access to special racecourses, and the Stormrider's Attire Transmog set. The mount has four color variants, with a slew of additional customization options available. The Transmog set can be upgraded to the Thundering Stormrider's Attire upon completing the special racecourses available with the Algarian Stormrider. Also includes an additional 250 Trader's Tender (750 in total) to use in the Trading Post.

data.heading: Epic Edition
data.description: Includes everything in the Heroic Edition. Plus, you'll have guaranteed Beta Access and Early Access (3 days) to The War Within⁴. You'll also receive 30 days of game time, Squally, the Storm Hatchling pet, Sandbox Storm Gryphon toy, and Deepdweller's Earthen Hearthstone effect. Also includes an additional 250 Trader's Tender (1000 in total) to use in the Trading Post.

productRequirements: ¹Future expansions not included in WoW®: The War Within™ purchase.
Requires World of Warcraft®, Internet connection, Battle.net® Account, and Battle.net® desktop app to play.
Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time
²World of Warcraft®: The War Within™ launches on August 26 at 3PM PT.
³If you already have Dragonflight on your account, the expansion will not be re-granted.

⁴Beta Access and Early Access dates subject to change. Minimum Early Access duration is 3 days. Limited time only. Play time subject to possible outages and time zone differences. Certain endgame features, including Mythic dungeons and weekly quests, not available during Early Access.
In-game items not available in WoW® Classic games. Boost only usable on the WoW® game account on which it was purchased or redeemed.

Upgrading to the Heroic or Epic Edition will not re-grant in-game items previously unlocked on your account. Trader's Tender is granted only once per Battle.net® account and region upon first purchase of each edition, at a maximum of 1000 Tender from Epic.

products.yellowText: Play free to level 20

productData.yellowText: Includes access to World of Warcraft, Cataclysm Classic, Classic Season of Discovery and Hardcore Realms!

subscriptionPriceInformation.text: Billed every 12 months. Cancel online anytime.
Billed every 6 months. Cancel online anytime.
Billed every 3 months. Cancel online anytime.
Billed every 1 month. Cancel online anytime.

descriptions: Join millions of players and enter a world of myth, magic, and endless adventure. With a single subscription you can access World of Warcraft and WoW Classic, including Cataclysm Classic, Season of Discovery, and Hardcore Realms.

Cataclysm Classic is live! From the fires of destruction, a new era of Azeroth arises. Subscribe now to experience a dramatically reforged Azeroth and defend it from the utter devastation of Deathwing!
Take to the skies in World of Warcraft: Dragonflight, get the expansion now and join forces with the dragonflights of Azeroth as they return to the Dragon Isles, a lost realm of magic and wonder.

When you purchase a 12-Month Subscription Offer, you receive the Ginormous Grrloc, Gleaming Moonbeast and Wondrous Wavewhisker mounts in World of Warcraft, plus, the Nightmarish Emerald Drake mount and the Glub pet in Cataclysm Classic. In addition, you will also get all the benefits from the current 6-Month Subscription Offer, including the Auspicious Arborwyrm mount with dynamic flight!

productInfo.text: For Special Offers, additional restrictions may apply
Subscription includes levels 1-60 in World of Warcraft®, 1-60 in World of Warcraft® Classic, and 1-85 in World of Warcraft®: Cataclysm Classic™
Subscription renews automatically once your latest subscription billing cycle ends, or your current game time expires

content.name: Reduced monthly subscription rate (see pricing above)
Auspicious Arborwyrm mount with dynamic flight in World of Warcraft®
Wondrous Wavewhisker mount in World of Warcraft®

data.heading: World of Warcraft®
data.description: Play World of Warcraft with access to every expansion through Shadowlands. Create your hero, embark on daring adventures, and rise to new heights of power as you level up your character. When you're ready for even more adventure, upgrade to the latest WoW expansion and begin your journey to the mystical Dragon Isles.

data.heading: Season of Discovery
data.description: The time has come to gather your friends, create a new character, and scour the lands of Azeroth to discover class-altering abilities, new endgame activities, and a new Rune Engraving system.

data.heading: Classic Hardcore Realms
data.description: Test your mettle and nerves with the ultimate challenge! On Hardcore realms, death is permanent, but friendships built along the way will last forever. No rezzes, no regrets!

productRequirements: Subscription includes levels 1-60 in World of Warcraft®, 1-60 in World of Warcraft® Classic, and 1-85 in World of Warcraft®: Cataclysm Classic™
Savings claims based on comparison with 1-Month Subscription price. "BEST VALUE" claim based on monthly subscription rate and in-game benefits included in 12-Month Offer.
Subscription renews automatically once your latest subscription billing cycle ends, or your current game time expires

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Begin your journey or renew your subscription

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Bundle up with these in-game goodies.

products.yellowText: Upgrade to get a haul of hot new items! Cataclysm Classic is LIVE and INCLUDED with your WoW Subscription.

productData.yellowText: Upgrade to get a haul of hot new items! Cataclysm Classic is LIVE and INCLUDED with your WoW Subscription.
descriptions: Cataclysm Classic™ is now live and included in your WoW Subscription or game time!

The maddened Deathwing the Destroyer has erupted from his lair once again, shattering Azeroth as we know it. Continue your WoW Classic journey into a new era of fire and destruction. This time, however, you’ll enjoy a much faster content cadence, improvements to Leveling, expanded Collections, and more.
In addition, optional Blazing Epic and Heroic Upgrades will heat up your experience with a haul of hot new items and bonuses.

productInfo.text: ¹Available in WoW® Classic progression realms (currently Cataclysm Classic™).
²Available in modern World of Warcraft® realms.

content.name: Runebound Firelord Flying Mount for Modern World of Warcraft Characters²
Lil' Wrathion Pet for Modern World of Warcraft® Characters²

productFeatures.heading: Upgrade Now
productFeatures.secondHeading: Ignite your journey with these fiery upgrades.

data.heading: Cataclysm Classic
data.description: Cataclysm Classic will be included with a World of Warcraft Subscription or Game Time at no additional cost once the game launches.

data.heading: Blazing Heroic Pack
data.description: The Blazing Heroic Pack includes Lil' Wrathion pet for both WoW Classic progression¹ and modern World of Warcraft characters², the Avatar of Flame flying mount¹ for WoW Classic progression characters, and a Runebound Firelord flying mount for modern World of Warcraft characters². WoW Classic progression characters will also enjoy Hammer Regalia Transmog Set and Town-In-A-Box Starter Set toy.

data.heading: Blazing Epic Upgrade
data.description: The Blazing Epic Upgrade includes everything in the Blazing Heroic Pack, plus a Level 80 Character Boost and 30 days of game time.

productRequirements: ¹Available in WoW® Classic progression realms (currently Cataclysm Classic™).
²Available in modern World of Warcraft® realms.

products.yellowText: Time to hoof it!

productData.descriptionHeading: Like a kodo in a crystal shop
descriptions: Add a new kodo-rable pet and mount pack to your Collection! Far from being merely beasts of burden, the kodos of Kalimdor are also fierce companions and loyal mounts—though less helpful where finesse might be required.
Whether you're riding the Armored Siege Kodo into battle, or frolicking about with the Crushhoof pet, one thing's for sure—these mighty beasts will always have your back.

productInfo.text: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time

data.heading: Crushhoof pet
data.description: Enjoy the joyful company of this rambunctious pet! You can also use the brave Crushhoof in pet battles, the fast and fun mini-game in World of Warcraft.

data.heading: Armored Siege Kodo mount
data.description: Ride in confidence astride this fearsome mount of hulking proportions. The Armored Siege Kodo is a ground mount that automatically scales to the fastest riding skill known by each character.

data.heading: Shared across characters
data.description: The Crushhoof pet and the Armored Siege Kodo mount will be ready to use immediately after purchasing. Once activated, they will be applied to present and future World of Warcraft characters on a single regional Battle.net account. They will appear in each character's Collections interface (Shift+P).

productRequirements: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Saddle up, because your mount will travel as fast as your riding skill will take you.

products.yellowText: Also available at no additional charge with 6 and 12-Month Subscriptions!

productData.yellowText: Also available at no additional charge with 6 and 12-Month Subscriptions!
productData.descriptionHeading: Good things come to those who wait
descriptions: Soar the skies of Azeroth in style with dynamic flight! Sprouting to life only once every sixty years, this living wooden mount combines the patience of a tree and the grace of a dragon.

Get this steadfast mount to use in World of Warcraft®, as well as the Cypress pet to keep you company in Wrath of the Lich King Classic™, at no additional charge with the purchase of a 6-Month or 12-Month subscription!

productInfo.text: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time

data.heading: Ready to go!
data.description: Auspicious Arborwyrm will be available immediately after completing your purchase.

data.heading: Shared across characters
data.description: Once activated, the mount will be applied to present and future World of Warcraft characters on a single regional Battle.net account. Auspicious Arborwyrm will appear in each character's Collections interface (Shift+P).

data.heading: Automatically upgrades
data.description: Auspicious Arborwyrm includes dynamic flight and automatically scales to the fastest riding skill known by each character. If they aren't high enough level to use as a flying mount, Auspicious Arborwyrm is also a ground mount.

productRequirements: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time

descriptions: The last of the sleepers is finally awakening! Watch your dreams become reality as you take to the skies on the Tangled Dreamweaver, bringing the dreams of the dragons back to the lands.

productInfo.text: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time

data.heading: Ready to go!
data.description: Tangled Dreamweaver will be available immediately after completing your purchase.

data.heading: Shared across characters
data.description: Once activated, the mount will be applied to present and future World of Warcraft characters on a single regional Battle.net account. Tangled Dreamweaver will appear in each character's Collections interface (Shift+P).

data.heading: Automatically upgrades
data.description: Tangled Dreamweaver automatically scales to the fastest riding skill known by each character. If they aren't high enough level to use a flying mount, Tangled Dreamweaver is also a ground mount.

productRequirements: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Adopt a pet and unleash your pet battle prowess with your new companion.

descriptions: Add some fiery flair to your adventures with Murkastrasza, hatch-queen of the baby murlocs. Support her with a /cheer to see her show off her fantastic flame breath!

productInfo.text: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time

data.heading: Ready to be at your side
data.description: Murkastrasza will join you immediately after your purchase and you can start exploring Azeroth together right away!

data.heading: Shared across characters
data.description: Once activated, Murkastrasza will be applied to present and future World of Warcraft characters on a single regional Battle.net account. It will appear in each character's Collections interface (Shift+P).

data.heading: Ready to fight!
data.description: You can use Murkastrasza in pet battles, the fast and fun mini-game in World of Warcraft.

productRequirements: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time

descriptions: Descended from a long pedigree of champion rescue hounds, the Alterac Brew Pup has a nose for finding travelers in distress in the high altitudes of the Alterac Mountains. However, it's the massive pup's ability to reignite your soul with its "warm spirits" on a cold night that will make this furry friend your most trusted and treasured companion.

data.heading: Ready to be unleashed!
data.description: The Alterac Brew Pup will be available immediately after completing your purchase. No papers to sign, and it's already had all its shots!

data.heading: Shared Across Characters
data.description: Once activated, your purchase will be applied to present and future World of Warcraft® characters on a single regional Battle.net Account. It will appear in each character's Collections interface (Shift+P in the default key binding).

data.heading: Always up for a fight
data.description: You can use the Alterac Brew Pup in pet battles, the fast and fun combat game in World of Warcraft that grants rewards and opens up daily quests.

productRequirements: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Add fun new toys to your in-game collection to entertain your allies or taunt your enemies!

descriptions: Make a mighty morphing moment for yourself or your party members when you deploy the Murkmorpher toy. Temporarily change your appearance into an ever-popular Westfall Story Murloc or other random colorful variant of the amphibious biped variety.

productInfo.text: Transformation lasts 20 minutes, and stays active in combat and after death. Player characters can be transformed once every 60 minutes.

data.heading: Swim in murloc waters
data.description: The Magical Murkmorpher Toy will temporarily change your appearance into a random murloc. You could Murkmorph into a classic Westfall Story Murloc or a unique one with random colors.

data.heading: Your own gaggle of murlocs
data.description: Once summoned, Magical Murkmorpher Toy will alter the shape of everyone in your party or raid group, should they so choose.

data.heading: Shared across characters
data.description: The Magical Murkmorpher Toy will be available immediately after completing your purchase. Once activated, the toy will be granted to current and future World of Warcraft characters in the same region on a single Battle.net Account.

productRequirements: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Collect, mix, and match your favorite transmogrification pieces to personalize a look that is uniquely you.

descriptions: It's easy being green when you're this comfy. Don the Happy or Angry Hood to become one with your inner Murloc!
Green Snugglefin Murloc Romper Includes

productInfo.text: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time

productRequirements: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Customize your gameplay however you'd like.

products.yellowText: Get the Enhanced Character Boost and jump into Dragonflight endgame ready!

productData.yellowText: Get the Enhanced Character Boost and jump into Dragonflight endgame ready!
productData.descriptionHeading: Bring your hero up to speed
descriptions: Grant a single character a one-time boost to level 70 and jump into the latest Dragonflight content endgame-ready! To boost multiple characters, buy a Character Boost pack and use them all at once or save some for later.
An Enhanced Level 70 Character Boost is also included in all editions of the upcoming The War Within™ expansion.
The Enhanced Level 70 Character Boost includes:
descriptionList: Immediate access to the start of the Guardians of the Dream campaign
Four 30-slot bags and one 26-slot reagent bag
Renown System unlocked at Renown 20 with the four initial Dragonflight major factions, and Renown 12 with Loamm Niffen faction

productInfo.text: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time
Requires the Dragonflight expansion to utilize the level boost

data.heading: Take it to a new level
data.description: Purchase Level 70 Character Boosts from Battle.net or from the in-game Shop. Then, return to the character select screen and click on the Character Boost token.

data.heading: Select your character
data.description: Follow the on-screen prompts to boost your character and select custom options (such as talent specializations).

data.heading: Drop in battle ready
data.description: Take your new-found powers out for a spin and discover what you've been missing. Your new level 70 character will come ready for battle outfitted in endgame-appropriate gear. (Boosted characters are unable to enter dungeons and raids from previous expansions for 24 hours.)

productRequirements: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time
Requires the Dragonflight expansion to utilize the level boost

productData.descriptionHeading: Bring your hero up to speed
descriptions: There comes a time in every hero's quest when they need a helping hand to get them over the hump and right back into the action. Now you can instantly boost your character to level 80, so they’re ready for their new adventures in the newly sundered Azeroth. The boosted character also receives level 80 appropriate gear, weapon skill, mount, the Expert Riding skill, and gold.

productInfo.text: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time
Only available on WoW® Classic progression realms (currently Cataclysm Classic™)

productData.descriptionHeading: Are you ready for adventures on a new realm?
descriptions: Transfer characters between WoW® Classic era realms, enabling you to play with a new community of players and/or find old friends on new servers – all without having to start over at level one. To move multiple characters, buy Character Transfer packs and use them all at once or save some for later.

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Experience the true meaning of joyful chaos in this all-new mobile action strategy game!

products.heading: Warcraft Rumble™
products.yellowText: Available Now

mobileQRCode.heading: Play on Mobile
mobileQRCode.description: Scan the QR code with your mobile device to download the game!

descriptions: Warcraft Rumble is a mobile action strategy game set within the Warcraft universe where collectible Minis come to life to battle in frantic melee skirmishes. Take on the single-player campaign if you're looking for a solo challenge, or go head-to-head in epic PvP skirmishes online. Experience the true meaning of joyful chaos!
productRequirements: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time
Only available on WoW® Classic progression realms (currently Cataclysm Classic™)

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Use Coins to purchase Minis, Tome of Experience, Talents, and more!

mobileQRCode.heading: Play on Mobile
mobileQRCode.description: Scan the QR code with your mobile device to download the game!

descriptions: Coins are an in-game currency that can be used in Warcraft Rumble to purchase Minis, Tomes of Experience, Talents, and more.
Buy bundles to wreak havoc on the battlefield. Coins are one of many ways to upgrade your army!

data.heading: Acquire new Minis & Leaders
data.description: Collect all the Minis in the game! Each Mini has its own unique tactical strengths and weaknesses.

data.heading: Power up your army
data.description: Once you have decked out your collection with a variety of Minis, Coins can be used to acquire Arc Energy and Cores to make your army even stronger and unlock their Talents. Minis can be leveled up via Tomes of Experience to help tackle tougher PvE challenges and gain an edge in PvP. Each Mini has 3 Talents that further increase their strategic and synergistic potential.

data.heading: Ascend to greater rarities
data.description: Ascend your Minis to Rare, Epic, and beyond using Coins alongside additional components like Arc Energy and Cores. Upgrading your Minis will allow access to more Talents and bonus levels, unlock their true potential, and tackle all the challenges Warcraft Rumble has to offer!

productRequirements: Requires internet connection and Battle.net® Account.

gameCarouselData.text: Co-op comes to Season 6

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Relive a Blizzard classic. Prepare for battle as Orcs, Humans, Undead, or Night Elves in this fantasy real-time strategy game.

descriptions: Warcraft III: Reforged is a stunning reimagining of the revolutionary real-time strategy game that laid the foundation for Azeroth's most epic stories. It is a remake in the truest sense, featuring a thorough visual overhaul, a suite of contemporary social and matchmaking features, and more. Command the Night Elves, Undead, Orcs, and Humans as alliances shift and armies clash in this timeless real-time strategy game.

productInfo.text: Internet connection, Battle.net® Account, and Battle.net® desktop app required to play.
Instant access to classic Warcraft® III (Reign of Chaos® and The Frozen Throne®)

data.heading: Experience an epic story
data.description: The founding of Orgrimmar. The fall of Lordaeron. The reign of the Burning Legion. The rise of the Lich King. Veterans and newcomers alike will experience these pivotal events in Azeroth's history like never before.

data.heading: The battlefield awaits
data.description: Play through the points of view of four distinct factions: the mighty Orcs, the noble Humans, the ancient Night Elves, and the insidious Undead. Gather resources, build your base, and assemble an army. Recruit powerful heroes to lead your forces, and meet your foes in battle. Destroy the enemy base to win the game!

data.heading: Vast campaigns
data.description: Relive the events of Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos and The Frozen Throne. Enjoy an epic saga retold with over four hours of reshot cutscenes and updated voice-overs that breathe new life into the earliest renditions of Azeroth’s key characters, across more than 60 single-player missions that span Kalimdor, Northrend, Lordaeron, and beyond.

productRequirements: Requires World of Warcraft® Subscription or Game Time
Only available on WoW® Classic progression realms (currently Cataclysm Classic™)

productsCategories.categoryDescription: New to Hearthstone? Start here.

descriptions: Sheathe your sword, draw your deck, and get ready for Hearthstone—the fast-paced strategy card game that's easy to learn and massively fun. You’ll play your cards to sling spells, summon creatures, and command the heroes of Warcraft in duels of epic strategy. Did we mention it's free to play?
Find Your New Favorite Toy with Hearthstone's newest expansion, Whizbang's Workshop.

data.heading: Jump right in!
data.description: Play on your own schedule—most games take less than 10 minutes whether you're battling your friends or the AI. Hearthstone's easy to learn and extremely accessible gameplay is available for Windows, Mac, and iPad.

data.heading: Free to play
data.description: Hearthstone is free to play, not just free to try or free to begin playing. Purchasing cards is optional, because you also earn them over the course of play by winning matches—or you can even craft them yourself.

data.heading: A new way to experience Warcraft®
data.description: Your deck is centered around a legendary hero and composed of minions, spells, items, and abilities from the epic Warcraft universe. While you play, the sights, sounds, and other details packed into Hearthstone bring the Warcraft universe to life in a way you've never experienced before.

productRequirements: Requires internet connection and Battle.net® Account.

price.productName: Hearthstone: 2 Showdown in the Badlands Packs
Hearthstone: 7 Showdown in the Badlands Packs

descriptions: Saddle up and prepare for a showdown in this 145-card Hearthstone expansion, including noble Outlaws, the new Excavate keyword, the new Quickdraw keyword, and more!

productInfo.text: Requires internet connection and Battle.net® Account to play.

productRequirements: Requires internet connection and Battle.net® Account.

descriptions: The Lich King returns to Hearthstone with an entirely new Death Knight class, the new Manathirst keyword, the new Undead minion type, and more in this 145-card Hearthstone expansion!

productInfo.text: Requires internet connection and Battle.net® Account to play.

productRequirements: Requires internet connection and Battle.net® Account.

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Grab a few packs and craft your ideal deck.

products.yellowText: Available through July 23, 2024

descriptions: Get the Whizbang's Workshop Tavern Pass to immediately receive a 10% XP Boost that lasts for the duration of the expansion, plus all items up to your current level on the paid Rewards Track! As you gain progress with the Tavern Pass, you can earn: additional XP Boosts; the Joymancer Jepetto Diamond Legendary card; the Colifero the Artist Golden Legendary card; the Li'Na Shop Manager Golden Legendary card; two Golden Epic cards; two Signature Epic cards; two Signature Rare cards; two Signature Common cards; 11 Whizbang's Workshop-themed Hero skins; a card back; a new cosmetic coin; and two Golden Standard Packs.

productInfo.text: Requires internet connection and Battle.net® Account to play.

data.heading: Unlock rewards faster!
data.description: Boost your XP gains by up to 20% and unlock your Rewards Track rewards even faster, until the next expansion launches.

data.heading: Get premium cards
data.description: Earn 2 Golden Standard Packs, a Diamond Joymancer Jepetto Legendary card, 2 Golden Legendary cards, 6 Signature cards, and more as you progress along the track.

data.heading: Toy With Your Opponents
data.description: Show your opponent you're not playing around with Whizbang's Workshop-themed Hero Skin for each class!

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Get a complete Mini-Set with powerful new cards for your decks. Non-Golden Mini-Set is also available in-game.

products.productName: Hearthstone®: Dr. Boom's Incredible Inventions Golden Mini-Set
products.yellowText: Get instant access to 72 Golden Mini-Set Cards plus and additional Diamond Card!

price.productName: Dr. Boom's Incredible Inventions Golden Mini-Set

descriptions: Dr. Boom's been tinkering and he's come up with something huge—gigantic, even—in the Whizbang's Workshop Dr. Boom’s Incredible Inventions Mini-Set! This Mini-Set includes the new Gigantify keyword and 38 unique cards. Purchase of the Mini-Set includes two copies of each Epic, Rare, and Common card, and one copy of each Legendary card, for a total of 72 cards! Purchase of the Golden Mini-Set includes Golden versions of the 72 Mini-Set cards, plus a bonus Diamond version of the Puppetmaster Dorian Legendary minion.

productInfo.text: Requires internet connection and Battle.net® Account to play.

headings: Dr. Boom's Incredible Inventions Golden Mini-Set

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Prepare yourself for Battlegrounds, where eight players face off in fast-paced combat.

products.yellowText: Available through August 20, 2024

descriptions: You don't need a fairy godmother to make your dreams come true, just the Battlegrounds Season Pass. The Battlegrounds Season Pass instantly unlocks two additional Hero options at the start of each game and lets you earn premium cosmetics throughout the Battlegrounds Track all season long!

productInfo.text: Battlegrounds Season Pass lasts until the next Battlegrounds season. Rewards can be earned until the end of the Season Pass. Any earned but unclaimed rewards will be automatically claimed when the Battlegrounds season ends.

productRequirements: Can only be redeemed once per account and is giftable.

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Enter the tavern, cozy up by the fire, and prepare for a battle of wits with this free-to-play collectible card game.

productData.yellowText: Use Runestones to buy your favorite Hearthstone products!
productData.descriptionHeading: Use Runestones to Unlock All Hearthstone Has to Offer
descriptions: Runestones are Hearthstone's virtual currency. Use them in lieu of direct purchases for Packs, Bundles, Cosmetics, the Battlegrounds Season Pass, and other Hearthstone products you could buy from the in-game Shop.

productInfo.text: Runestones can only be used to purchase in-game Shop products.

productRequirements: Runestones can only be used to purchase in-game Shop products.

productsCategories.categoryDescription: Join players in Wild format, where any card is playable and legends live on.

products.yellowText: Requires Bronze 10 Rank or better to open and cannot be used in Standard.

productData.yellowText: Requires Bronze 10 Rank or better to open and cannot be used in Standard.
productData.descriptionHeading: Use Runestones to Unlock All Hearthstone Has to Offer
descriptions: Brave the unknown with a Golden Wild card pack! Available in quantities of 5, 11, 23, and 30, these packs will add an assortment of cards currently playable in the Wild format to your Hearthstone collection. Whether you seek candle-adorned Kobolds, bomb-lobbing Goblins, or a rather dashing Reno, these possibilities and more await you in Wild packs. Each card in a Golden Wild pack is of either Golden or Signature quality.

productInfo.text: Wild cards are not eligible for Standard format play, but can be used in the Wild and Twist formats (Twist restrictions and card pools vary from season to season, some Wild cards may not be eligible for Twist play for any particular season).

productRequirements: Runestones can only be used to purchase in-game Shop products.

productData.yellowText: Everything you need to begin your adventure, offer available through June 23!
productData.descriptionHeading: Journey to a world of epic fantasy and masterful strategy
descriptions: Azeroth, land of magic, mystery, and legendary heroes, is beset by the orcish invaders. Take up arms for your king and defend the realm, or lead the Horde on their bloodthirsty conquest. Command the battlefield, outflank your enemies, and gain victory… or suffer crushing defeat and be forgotten forever. The battle for Azeroth begins today!

productInfo.text: Localization for this game isn't available. You can purchase the game and play it in English only.

data.heading: A real-time strategy classic
data.description: Witness an inflection point for the entire RTS genre, when one game opened up a whole new world of strategy gameplay possibilities.

data.heading: Origin story
data.description: The narrative threads of the Warcraft universe all lead back to here. Dive in and see first-hand the events that still drive the story of Warcraft today.

data.heading: Face off like it's 1994
data.description: Go head-to-head with a friend in intense 1v1 strategy battles for ultimate victory. Become the master strategist and crush your foes without mercy!

productRequirements: Localization for this game isn't available. You can purchase the game and play it in English only.

data.heading: Processor
data.data: 4 Cores, 3.0 GHz processor (4th Generation Intel® Core™ Haswell or AMD Ryzen™ Zen)

products.yellowText: Includes the Warcraft II: Beyond the Dark Portal expansion

productData.yellowText: Includes the Warcraft II: Beyond the Dark Portal expansion
productData.descriptionHeading: The war between orc and man rages on across the seas
descriptions: The kingdom of Stormwind lies in ruins. The king has fallen, and the survivors of the orcish onslaught flee across the ocean. The pursuing Horde, eager to plunge the world into chaos, sails its fleet to meet the defenders of Azeroth in battle. As the fate of the world hangs in the balance and the great tacticians of the Horde and the Alliance clash, only one thing is certain: Winning this war will demand unprecedented cunning, courage, and nerves of steel.

productInfo.text: Localization for this game isn't available. You can purchase the game and play it in English only.

data.heading: Battle across land, air, and sea
data.description: Charge into the fray on foot, soar across the sky on the backs of mighty dragons or at the helm of gnomish flying machines, and dominate the waves from aboard massive dreadnoughts or stealthy submersible sea turtles.

data.heading: Conquer the shattered realm of Outland
data.description: Once you've mastered the 28 scenarios of Tides of Darkness, prepare to take the war to the orcs' homeworld of Draenor in 24 more scenarios as part of the Beyond the Dark Portal expansion.

data.heading: More players, more glory
data.description: Launch epic multiplayer battles of up to 8 players, then build your own maps using the map editor. Fight across swamps, icy fields, summer plains, and even the wastes of Outland!

productRequirements: Localization for this game isn't available. You can purchase the game and play it in English only.
